review: Its really nice not having to run movies and TV through a gaming console.  The streaming is almost flawless even when the wireless network lags.  Love it!
author: Kindle Customer

review: Granddaughter loves it as her TV didn't receive some channels.
author: jet

review: I bought 1 for Christmas for my husband and a 2nd one for my birthday. If it hadn't worked great I wouldn't have bought the 2nd. And I'm thinking of getting a 3rd.
author: DebM
